events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The battery supply chain is divided into three main segments: upstream, midstream, and downstream. The supply chains for critical minerals vary by geography, with significant control exercised by automotive manufacturers over their material supply chains.
events.description: The battery supply chain is divided into three main segments: upstream, midstream, and downstream. The supply chains for critical minerals vary by geography, with significant control exercised by automotive manufacturers over their material supply chains.

events.name: Upstream
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and extraction of raw materials for battery production.
events.description: Involves the mining and extraction of raw materials for battery production.

events.name: Mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting ores and minerals from the earth to supply raw materials for battery production.
events.description: The process of extracting ores and minerals from the earth to supply raw materials for battery production.

events.name: Extraction
events.wd_description: The process of isolating valuable minerals from extracted ores to prepare for further processing.
events.description: The process of isolating valuable minerals from extracted ores to prepare for further processing.

events.name: Midstream
events.wd_description: The processing of raw materials into battery-grade components, focusing mainly on cathode production due to its significant cost and impact on battery characteristics.
events.description: The processing of raw materials into battery-grade components, focusing mainly on cathode production due to its significant cost and impact on battery characteristics.

events.name: Cathode production
events.wd_description: The process of creating cathode materials, which are crucial for determining battery characteristics like energy density and charging speed.
events.description: The process of creating cathode materials, which are crucial for determining battery characteristics like energy density and charging speed.

events.name: LFP
events.wd_description: Lithium Iron Phosphate cathode production, focusing on minimizing supply chain vulnerabilities associated with lithium sourcing.
events.description: Lithium Iron Phosphate cathode production, focusing on minimizing supply chain vulnerabilities associated with lithium sourcing.

events.name: NMC
events.wd_description: Nickel Manganese Cobalt cathode production, which involves complex supply chain dependencies and higher vulnerability due to multiple critical materials.
events.description: Nickel Manganese Cobalt cathode production, which involves complex supply chain dependencies and higher vulnerability due to multiple critical materials.

events.name: Anode production
events.wd_description: The process of producing anode materials, typically using graphite, for battery cells.
events.description: The process of producing anode materials, typically using graphite, for battery cells.

events.name: Electrolyte production
events.wd_description: The process of producing electrolyte solutions, typically lithium salt solutions, for battery cells.
events.description: The process of producing electrolyte solutions, typically lithium salt solutions, for battery cells.

events.name: Downstream
events.wd_description: Involves cell and pack manufacturing, as well as end-of-life recycling and reuse of battery components.
events.description: Involves cell and pack manufacturing, as well as end-of-life recycling and reuse of battery components.

events.name: Cell manufacturing
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells from processed materials.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells from processed materials.

events.name: Pack manufacturing
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery packs from individual cells.
events.description: The assembly of battery packs from individual cells.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The process of recycling and reusing end-of-life battery components to recover valuable materials.
events.description: The process of recycling and reusing end-of-life battery components to recover valuable materials.
